data.name: DISDAIN
data.detailed_description:
High Speed, High Adrenaline Combat
Choose between five weapons (more coming soon) and obliterate your enemies in fast-paced, visceral combat

Chunky Retro Violence
Slice your enemies into two, or reduce them to chunky gibs. Destructible objects also add to the carnage

Bespoke Nu-Retro Technology
Powered by a highly modified version of GZDoom, DISDAIN boasts several enhanced features like pre-calculated lightmaps, lens flares, and many more

Atmospheric and Hard Hitting Soundtrack
Composed by Nash Muhandes, blast through your enemies with carefully-crafted music ranging from moody, dark textures, to head-banging metal riffs
data.about_the_game:
High Speed, High Adrenaline Combat
Choose between five weapons (more coming soon) and obliterate your enemies in fast-paced, visceral combat

Chunky Retro Violence
Slice your enemies into two, or reduce them to chunky gibs. Destructible objects also add to the carnage

Bespoke Nu-Retro Technology
Powered by a highly modified version of GZDoom, DISDAIN boasts several enhanced features like pre-calculated lightmaps, lens flares, and many more

Atmospheric and Hard Hitting Soundtrack
Composed by Nash Muhandes, blast through your enemies with carefully-crafted music ranging from moody, dark textures, to head-banging metal riffs
data.short_description: DISDAIN is a fast-paced, visceral retro-styled first person shooter, inspired by the legendary FPS games of yesteryear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper Windows drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64-bit Quad-Core with SSE2 Support 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 with RTX extensions
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper Windows drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: mac OS 12.0
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+ or Apple Silicon (M1)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: mac OS 12.0
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+ or Apple Silicon (M1)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable graphics
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu - Latest Version or LTS
  • Processor: 64-bit Quad-Core with SSE2 Support 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 with RTX extensions
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains low polygonal blood and gore, and enemy dismemberment
